subject: Sex Crimes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: An investigation determined there was no evidence that Gov. Tom Corbett tried to slow the Jerry Sandusky sexual-abuse case at Penn State for political purposes as he ran for the office.
snippet: An investigation determined there was no evidence that Gov. Tom Corbett tried to slow the Jerry Sandusky sexual-abuse case at Penn State for political purposes as he ran for the office.
